name: Readyland
0:
”Alexa, open Readyland”
”Alexa, start Readyland”
”Alexa, launch Readyland”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content. This skill can extend the  mic timeout.
Invocation Name: ready land
des:
Readyland – Alexa interactive books

The Readyland skill is the companion skill for Readyland Books.

Readyland books are REAL physical books that come to life with Alexa. Experience the joy of books in a whole new way – actually talk with characters, play games, make choices, listen to music, and more. There are 100’s of interactions, so the adventure is always changing. Inspire a love of books with Readyland!

Are you ready?

Just open your Readyland book and say, “Alexa, open Readyland!”

• Owl & Dragon, A Magical Adventure
• A Trip to the Park with Rosie & Ricky
• A Playdate with Rosie & Ricky
• 3 Little Pigs
• Jack and the Beanstalk
• And more to come!

Requirements: All you need is a Readyland book, Alexa, and your imagination! Readyland books are available NOW on Amazon!

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
